Which package manager(s) should this support?

- [ ] Scoop (Windows)

- [ ] Snap

- [ ] RPM (Fedora/RHEL)

## Checklist

- [ ] The package is FOSS (open source)
- [ ] The package has stable releases
- [ ] I'm willing to help maintain this package
